title: A Warm Winter Shifts The Path Of Alaska's Iditarod
teaser: The Iditarod sled dog race starts in earnest Monday, with 78 teams spending the next week and a half crossing 1,000 miles hoping to arrive first in Nome. But this year's race won't begin, as it usually does, in Anchorage because there isn't enough snow.
